quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Don't count the days. Make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Do it now. Sometimes 'later' becomes 'never'.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: The hard days are what make you stronger.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.text: Push harder than yesterday if you want a different tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma
quotes.source: The Leader Who Had No Title

quotes.text: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Go the extra mile. It's never crowded.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Your only limit is you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Don't wish for it. Work for it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: One day or day one. You decide.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be stronger than your excuses.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Excuses don't burn calories.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I will. I am.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Today is a good day to try.
quotes.author: Quasimoto

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Good things come to those who hustle.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Be the energy you want to attract.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Stay focused and never give up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be patient with yourself. Nothing in nature blooms all year.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You didn't come this far to only come this far.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If it doesn't challenge you, it won't change you.
quotes.author: Fred DeVito

quotes.text: Make today so awesome yesterday gets jealous.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem
quotes.source: Rise Up and Salute the Sun

quotes.text: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Believe in yourself a little more.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are capable of amazing things.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop until you're proud.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Turn your can'ts into cans and your dreams into plans.
quotes.author: Kobi Yamada

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let perfection become procrastination. Do it now.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: Take the risk or lose the chance.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: You get what you give. What you put into things is what you get out of them.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson
quotes.source: In One Era and Out the Other

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: No matter how you feel, get up, dress up, show up, and never give up.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: It's not about perfect. It's about effort.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
